meanings.definition: The quality of being free from pretense or deceit; honesty.
meanings.sent1: Her sincerity in helping others was truly admirable.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your sincerity in admitting your mistake.
meanings.sent3: His sincerity in claiming he could fly made us all chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The sincerity of her smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sincerity in his voice made it clear he was telling the truth.

meanings.definition: The quality of being genuine or authentic.
meanings.sent1: The sincerity of his apology touched my heart.
meanings.sent2: The sincerity of her laughter was infectious.
meanings.sent3: The robot's attempt at sincerity was both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent4: The sincerity of the old book's pages revealed its age.
meanings.sent5: The sincerity of the handmade gift brought tears to her eyes.

meanings.definition: The state of being sincere in one's actions or intentions.
meanings.sent1: His sincerity in promising to help was reassuring.
meanings.sent2: The sincerity of her commitment to the project was evident.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sincerity in pretending to be a lion was comical.
meanings.sent4: The sincerity of the sun's warmth enveloped us all.
meanings.sent5: The sincerity of the child's apology melted her mother's heart.
